scripts.build:packages: pnpm --filter @zypherus/shared-types build && pnpm --filter @zypherus/audio-utils build && pnpm --filter @zypherus/sdk build
scripts.pack:sdk: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm --filter @zypherus/sdk pack --pack-destination artifacts
scripts.pack:artifacts: pnpm run pack:shared-types && pnpm run pack:sdk
